name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D CONCERT】KIARA & FRIENDS： H!P Cover Song Spring Concert #HPmeetsHoloEN [jjLLByDa3Xc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Kiara, Calliope, and IRyS perform the song 'Independent Girl ~Dokuritsu Joshi de Aru Tame ni~' on a 3D stage.
scenes.song_name: Independent Girl ~Dokuritsu Joshi de Aru Tame ni~

scenes.description: The performers take a break for an MC section inside the venue, introducing themselves and discussing their independence.

subtitles.original: Independent Girl ~独立女子であるために~
subtitles.english: Independent Girl ~To be an Independent Girl~

subtitles.original: Independent girl にならなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I have to become an independent girl

subtitles.original: あーは　すぐに取り戻せ自分
subtitles.english: A-ha, take yourself back immediately

subtitles.original: 自分で決めた答えはきっと正しい
subtitles.english: The answer I decided on for myself is surely right

subtitles.original: Independent girl にならなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I have to become an independent girl

subtitles.original: あーは　あなたはあなたよ
subtitles.english: A-ha, you are you

subtitles.original: 私達の未来は自分で切り開くの
subtitles.english: We will carve out our own future

subtitles.original: Independent girl じゃなきゃダメさ
subtitles.english: It has to be an independent girl

subtitles.original: あーは　声を聞かせてよ誰か
subtitles.english: A-ha, let me hear your voice, someone

subtitles.original: 誰かのモノなんかじゃないんだ私達
subtitles.english: We aren't anyone's property

subtitles.original: Independent girl じゃなきゃダメさ
subtitles.english: It has to be an independent girl

subtitles.original: あーは　こっちを向いてよ
subtitles.english: A-ha, look this way

subtitles.original: 自分の生き方くらい自分で決めてみなよ
subtitles.english: Decide your own way of life by yourself

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: I got the memo. Yatta!
subtitles.english: I got the memo. I did it!

subtitles.original: Hello! O-yay!
subtitles.english: Hello! O-yay!

subtitles.original: 私達 Independent Girls です！
subtitles.english: We are the Independent Girls!

subtitles.original: Yeah, we're the independent joshi! Yeah, that's right!
subtitles.english: Yeah, we're the independent girls! Yeah, that's right!

subtitles.original: Okay, let me please let me hear some introductions. How about we start with my senpai...
subtitles.english: Okay, let me please let me hear some introductions. How about we start with my senpai...

subtitles.original: ...my once senpai? How... how much of a senpai are you?
subtitles.english: ...my once senpai? How... how much of a senpai are you?

subtitles.original: I'm your senpai by one stream.
subtitles.english: I'm your senpai by one stream.

subtitles.original: It's like we're twins, you know? Who's born first?
subtitles.english: It's like we're twins, you know? Who's born first?

subtitles.original: True, that's a good point. Okay, I guess that would be me.
subtitles.english: True, that's a good point. Okay, I guess that would be me.

subtitles.original: Minasan, it's me, Mori Calliope, Hololive English's rapping reaper singer-songwriter. Hello everybody!
subtitles.english: Everyone, it's me, Mori Calliope, Hololive English's rapping reaper singer-songwriter. Hello everybody!

subtitles.original: If you don't know me, now you do. Who's next?
subtitles.english: If you don't know me, now you do. Who's next?

subtitles.original: Ah, the kouhai IRyS-pon here? Okay then.
subtitles.english: Ah, the junior IRyS-pon here? Okay then.

subtitles.original: IRyS! It's IRyS from Hololive English: Project HOPE's stays-at-home Nephilim...
subtitles.english: IRyS! It's IRyS from Hololive English: Project HOPE's stays-at-home Nephilim...

subtitles.original: ...here to bring hope to this world and to Kiara.
subtitles.english: ...here to bring hope to this world and to Kiara.

subtitles.original: Oh, the hope of all of us! Kouhai IRyS! Welcome!
subtitles.english: Oh, the hope of all of us! Junior IRyS! Welcome!

subtitles.original: Well girls, we have just performed 'Independent Girl ~独立女子であるために~'...
subtitles.english: Well girls, we have just performed 'Independent Girl ~To be an Independent Girl~'...

subtitles.original: ...by Buono! My Buono! It's a long title.
subtitles.english: ...by Buono! My Buono! It's a long title.

subtitles.original: Dokuritsu Joshi! Dokuritsu Joshi.
subtitles.english: Independent girls! Independent girls.

subtitles.original: And we're now inside, by the way. We're in the building that was behind previously.
subtitles.english: And we're now inside, by the way. We're in the building that was behind previously.

subtitles.original: It's so dark! It's like a planetarium. Pretty! Okay.
subtitles.english: It's so dark! It's like a planetarium. Pretty! Okay.

subtitles.original: You can move in here with me if you want to! Wanna? Wanna?
subtitles.english: You can move in here with me if you want to! Wanna? Wanna?

subtitles.original: Sure. I kind of want to go for a walk outside. A walk outside?
subtitles.english: Sure. I kind of want to go for a walk outside. A walk outside?

subtitles.original: Maybe not, because don't we want to be independent girls? Why would we live together?
subtitles.english: Maybe not, because don't we want to be independent girls? Why would we live together?

subtitles.original: That's true.
subtitles.english: That's true.

subtitles.original: Speaking of that, come back, independent ladies! Trying to be an independent girl, I don't know.
subtitles.english: Speaking of that, come back, independent ladies! Trying to be an independent girl, I don't know.

subtitles.original: I want to ask you girls something. What makes you such an independent girl?
subtitles.english: I want to ask you girls something. What makes you such an independent girl?

subtitles.original: Oh, such a great cue. I didn't have time to prepare for this at all.
subtitles.english: Oh, such a great cue. I didn't have time to prepare for this at all.

subtitles.original: For Mori, I always was playing alone by myself at the playground. Beyond that, I had to...
subtitles.english: For Mori, I always was playing alone by myself at the playground. Beyond that, I had to...

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah, I had no friends. Oh, no friends?
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, I had no friends. Oh, no friends?

subtitles.original: Now too. You go to the playground? Oh, I mean, I kind of feel like...
subtitles.english: Now too. You go to the playground? Oh, I mean, I kind of feel like...

subtitles.original: ...have you seen the park outside? It's so lovely. That's true.
subtitles.english: ...have you seen the park outside? It's so lovely. That's true.

subtitles.original: No, for me, the main reason I think I'm an independent girl is because I do a lot of music stuff on my own.
subtitles.english: No, for me, the main reason I think I'm an independent girl is because I do a lot of music stuff on my own.

subtitles.original: So I write my own songs and stuff like that. Yeah, and do a lot of things myself.
subtitles.english: So I write my own songs and stuff like that. Yeah, and do a lot of things myself.

subtitles.original: So I feel like that's something an independent person has to do.
subtitles.english: So I feel like that's something an independent person has to do.

subtitles.original: I count that. Yes. Build bit of a lone wolf.
subtitles.english: I count that. Yes. Build bit of a lone wolf.

subtitles.original: Yeah, what about you? How are you independent? I would say...
subtitles.english: Yeah, what about you? How are you independent? I would say...

subtitles.original: ...well, it's many things. Like for example, since last year, I own a home!
subtitles.english: ...well, it's many things. Like for example, since last year, I own a home!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！ But that might make some people cry right now, it's too depressing.
subtitles.english: Congratulations! But that might make some people cry right now, it's too depressing.

subtitles.original: Uh, but yeah, also having my own babies, aka my cats. She's a mom!
subtitles.english: Uh, but yeah, also having my own babies, aka my cats. She's a mom!

subtitles.original: But anyway, I want to hear why IRyS is independent. Or is she not very independent at all?
subtitles.english: But anyway, I want to hear why IRyS is independent. Or is she not very independent at all?

subtitles.original: Independent? あらあら！
subtitles.english: Independent? Oh my goodness!

subtitles.original: Independent? What makes you not independent, IRyS? Maybe we can fix it.
subtitles.english: Independent? What makes you not independent, IRyS? Maybe we can fix it.

subtitles.original: I... I can't open water... I can open water bottles by myself if I try really hard.
subtitles.english: I... I can't open water... I can open water bottles by myself if I try really hard.

subtitles.original: I can wake up with... with multiple alarms. I... I can... I can...
subtitles.english: I can wake up with... with multiple alarms. I... I can... I can...
